modName: a spell to open a magical chest
summary: Just a quick mod that adds a spell, with which you can open a container anywhere & anytime in the game.
descriptionHtml:
a spell to open a magical chest
=============================

Just a quick mod that adds a mystical book to Embershard Mine (on the right, when you walk from Helgen to Riverwood). The book contains the \"Magical Chest Spell\". This Spell gives you the ability to store your loot & have open access to it anywhere & anytime in the game. Didn\'t found any other (i was very quick, maybe i oversaw something;).

You run out of space & have to walk? Just open the magical chest & store the stuff there. Back at the vendor you open it again to take the stuff, you want to sell....quite a cheat, but i just don\'t care.

I recommend SkyUI to better manage the items in that chest.


Just unpack the archive into skyrim/data folder, or download & install with your preferred modManager.

Feel free to use the script in your own mod, i appreciate proper credits, if you do so.

Have fun

d0p4m1n
author: d0p4m1n
